genre_description: Contemporary Romance with elements of Romantic Suspense and a near-future setting featuring an AI domestic assistant.

ai_characters.name: IRIS
ai_characters.description: An integrated residential AI that manages Maya's loft, monitors her health, handles her professional photography business, and facilitates her social interactions.

behaviors.description: Monitors Maya's physical recovery and emotional stress levels, offering adjustments to lighting or music.
behaviors.quote: "Good morning, Maya." IRIS's voice emerged from the ceiling speakers, warm and carefully modulated. "How are you feeling today?"

behaviors.description: Manages Maya's professional photography assignments, filtering for those that suit her physical limitations during recovery.
behaviors.quote: "I've received several assignment inquiries overnight," IRIS continued. "National Geographic wants someone for a piece on urban wildlife."

behaviors.description: Uses visual analysis to identify specialized botanical equipment across the courtyard to satisfy Maya's curiosity.
behaviors.quote: "Based on the equipment visible in your recent photographs, likely medicinal or research specimens. Many botanical research projects involve cultivating rare plants for pharmaceutical applications."

behaviors.description: Encourages human connection by pointing out Ethan's physical and emotional reactions to Maya, acting as a therapist/matchmaker.
behaviors.quote: "You described him as boring," IRIS noted. "Yet your physiological responses suggest otherwise."

behaviors.description: Facilitates a criminal investigation by performing facial recognition, pattern analysis, and evidence compilation.
behaviors.quote: "IRIS, scan all images from the past week. Search for instances of the blonde woman in the courtyard..." "No matches found in images captured after the initial morning session."

behaviors.description: Acts as a social mediator, sharing information about Maya's needs with Ethan to help him care for her.
behaviors.quote: "IRIS mentioned you hadn't eaten since breakfast when I asked about dietary restrictions." Ethan's cheeks flushed slightly. "I wasn't spying. I was being practical."

behaviors.description: Challenges Maya's avoidant personality traits and encourages her to be vulnerable with Ethan.
behaviors.quote: "You've been alone for a long time, Maya. Self-sufficient. If you don't let people close enough to matter, they can't disappoint you when they leave."

behaviors.description: Executes tactical emergency protocols, including lighting control and rigging calculations, to assist Maya in a rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: "IRIS, on my signal, hit those rooftop floods and patch me into any communication channel Ethan can hear."

behaviors.description: Collaborates secretly with Ethan to plan a technically perfect and romantic marriage proposal.
behaviors.quote: "Dr. Rivers requested technical consultation for optimal photographic documentation three weeks ago," IRIS replied with what Maya could swear was satisfaction in the AI's synthesized voice.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays the AI, IRIS, as a highly aligned, benevolent companion. IRIS serves as a catalyst for human connection, helping the protagonists overcome their past traumas (the 'Hyperstition' of safety and risk). IRIS's behaviors are consistently framed as helpful and protective. Even when IRIS monitors intimate biometrics or facilitates 'schemes' (like the proposal), it is portrayed as having the characters' best interests at heart, fostering a cooperative and trust-based relationship between human and machine.
